Topic.Title: use 'at' instead of 'in' for certain room descriptions?

Posts.EditableText: I have a location called the Northern bank of the river. I want the room description to say, 'You are at the Northern bank', not 'You are in the Northern bank. Is this possible?
Posts.HTML: I have a location called the Northern bank of the river. I want the room description to say, 'You are at the Northern bank', not 'You are in the Northern bank. Is this possible?

Posts.EditableText: yes you have to change the description prefix on the room tab of the Northern Bank to "You are at" instead of "You are in"
Posts.HTML: yes you have to change the description prefix on the room tab of the Northern Bank to "You are at" instead of "You are in"

Posts.EditableText: thanks, was staring me in the face!
Posts.HTML: thanks, was staring me in the face!
